name: benfordslaw
description: Check if a number array confirms to the Benford's Law

scripts.coverage:badges: npm run coverage && jest-coverage-badges && npm run coverage:badges-to-png
scripts.coverage:badges-to-png: npx svpng ./coverage/badge-branches.svg ./coverage/badge-branches.png && npx svpng ./coverage/badge-functions.svg ./coverage/badge-functions.png && npx svpng ./coverage/badge-lines.svg ./coverage/badge-lines.png && npx svpng ./coverage/badge-statements.svg ./coverage/badge-statements.png

author: Christoph Miksche

hooks.pre-commit: npm run coverage:badges && git add coverage/*
